items.text: To the chief Musician, Al-taschith, A Psalm or Song of Asaph.
items.plainText: To the chief Musician, Al-taschith, A Psalm or Song of Asaph.

items.text: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks, unto thee do we give thanks: for that thy name is near thy wondrous works declare.
items.plainText: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks, unto thee do we give thanks: for that thy name is near thy wondrous works declare.

items.text: When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly.
items.plainText: When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly.

items.text: The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved: I bear up the pillars of it. Selah.
items.plainText: The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved: I bear up the pillars of it. Selah.

items.text: I said unto the fools, Deal not foolishly: and to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:
items.plainText: I said unto the fools, Deal not foolishly: and to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:

items.text: Lift not up your horn on high: speak not with a stiff neck.
items.plainText: Lift not up your horn on high: speak not with a stiff neck.

items.text: For promotion cometh neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south.
items.plainText: For promotion cometh neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south.

items.text: But God is the judge: he putteth down one, and setteth up another.
items.plainText: But God is the judge: he putteth down one, and setteth up another.

items.text: For in the hand of the LORD there is a cup, and the wine is red; it is full of mixture; and he poureth out of the same: but the dregs thereof, all the wicked of the earth shall wring them out, and drink them.
items.plainText: For in the hand of the LORD there is a cup, and the wine is red; it is full of mixture; and he poureth out of the same: but the dregs thereof, all the wicked of the earth shall wring them out, and drink them.

items.text: But I will declare for ever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.
items.plainText: But I will declare for ever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.

items.text: All the horns of the wicked also will I cut off; but the horns of the righteous shall be exalted.
items.plainText: All the horns of the wicked also will I cut off; but the horns of the righteous shall be exalted.
